summary: Aberdeen Football Club, based in Scotland, is a successful team in the Scottish Premiership. They've never been demoted from the top league and have won many trophies, including four Scottish league titles and two European titles in 1983. The club was formed in 1903 and first found success after World War II. Their most glorious era was in the 1980s under manager Alex Ferguson. Aberdeen plays at Pittodrie Stadium, which was the UK's first all-seated, covered stadium. The team's colors are red and white, and they have rivalries with teams like Dundee United, Celtic, and Rangers.
title: Aberdeen F.C.
